body.name: MsMk 7 inch Small Frying Pan, Carbonize also Nonstick, PFOA Free Non-Toxic, Scratch-resistant, Induction Egg skillet, for Induction, Ceramic and Gas Cooktops
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins
features: PRO NONSTICK: Get restaurant-quality meals at home just like a pro chef with MSMK egg pan! Coated with a triple-layer of nonstick material and tough titanium ceramic diamond compound to make them super durable. USA and GRE TUV approved, PFOA FREE, no nickel, lead and other heavy metals, safe for children, PTFE&PFAS Free

🍳PROFESSIONAL HEAT DISTRIBUTION: 4mm-thick smooth stainless-steel bottom & skillet design with thick mouth and thin body allow for more even heat distribution, create perfect omelets without burning the bottom on your induction hob, say goodbye to frustrating hot spots and uneven cooking, and cook like a pro with confidence, achieving a consistent taste with the restaurant

🍳COOKING LOW IN FAT: Say goodbye to smoke-filled kitchens and enjoy a clean, healthy cooking experience, cleaning up after a meal has never been simpler, thanks to the cooking pan's non-stick surface that easily wipes clean and ensures even the stickiest, messiest dishes like corn cakes and cheesy bakes slide right off with ease

🍳STAY-COOL STEEL HANDLE: The small pan Y-shaped structure allows the handle to dissipate heat effectively and keep the handle cool continuously, keeping yourself and your loved ones safe when cooking. The sealed design prevents any soup or sauce from getting inside, making it easy to clean. Plus, the hole at the end of the handle allows for easy hanging on a wall, saving valuable storage space in your cabinets

🍳LIFETIME WARRANTY: DESIGN IN USA with imported components, we stand behind our induction cookware and offer a 100% replacement policy for free if any issues arise due to the product's manufacturing or material defects. You can trust that each item has been carefully crafted to meet our high standards and will provide long-lasting value

🍳OVEN SAFE TO 700℉: With our egg pans, you can seamlessly transition your sautéed dishes straight into the oven for final changes, without sacrificing taste or quality. Our non-stick coating adds ease, efficiency, and peace of mind to your cooking experience
🍳IDEAL GIFT: our non-stick cookware! Easy-to-use. Perfect for anyone, from amateur cooks to seasoned chefs. Unwrap it and see pure excitement on their faces. A gift they'll rave about for years

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our durable and stable design can improve the cooking experience for chefs There's always room for improvement in cookware - that's the fundamental idea behind MSMK. Many of the cookware we use in our daily lives is so fragile that we take it for granted that we have to replace them often. We've found ways to extend the life of these products. 1 2 3 4 5 6
Great non stick Support omelette five times a day for 20 years Nonstick Non-stick even when scorched Scorched Passed stong test Passed the steel ball strong corrosion test stong

Comfortable Handle Y-shaped structure reduce heat transfer and maintain balance Hollow design The hollow design of the stainless steel handle can relieve weight Sanding design Reduces fingerprint impressions and increases comfort Double rivets Sturdy and durable

Unique heating induction The smooth induction bottom design helps distribute heat evenly, thereby improving the quality of your cooking and most importantly the taste of the food. Professional heat distribution 4mm-thick smooth stainless steel bottom & pot design with thick mouth and thin body allow for more even heat distribution.
Previous page The pot body is resistant to scratches from hardwood spatula at 700℉. Can still fry eggs after 40,000 wear tests Next page 1 Scratch-resistant 2 40,000 times wear test
Previous page No PFOA design at high temperatures. The core of cooking is to control the temperature Next page 1 700°F for oven safety 2 Control the temperature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for frying egg
reviews.reviewText: Well made, sturdy and shows quality material used. It is also a perfect size for me to fry my eggs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pan is exactly what I wanted. A little pricey but love the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2. These work well for breakfast sausage and eggs. No stick, dishwasher friendly. Works on induction stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice pan for breakfast.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice pan. It is perfect for eggs, omelette sand breakfast meats.Nonstick coating looks very durable. Recommend using silicone utensils per manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good frying pan
reviews.reviewText: well built, very balanced , a joy to use, would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little frying pan
reviews.reviewText: Got it to replace a really old frying pan. It's the perfect size and very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these but the non-stick wore off after a few months. Also the rivets are NOT non-stick from day one. Otherwise a fine pan.
